name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of December 10, in Chengdu, Sichuan, near Sanhechang Station on Metro Line 3, a man indiscriminately injured people with scissors. An injured woman said, "I was walking on the road, and then a madman stabbed me. I didn't know him." Police report: The suspect (male, 29 years old) has been detained, and the three injured were sent to the hospital for treatment in time, all with minor injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Jiangsu. A woman exposed that the orthopedic equipment sold by the Department of Orthopedics of the Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University was priced at 970 yuan per bone nail in the Jiangsu Province Medical Insurance Network, but the Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University sold it at 3,781 yuan per nail.
The woman questioned whether the hospital was stealing medical insurance funds by selling orthopedic equipment at a higher price than normal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens in Xi'an reported that their talent employment awards were announced in October and November last year, but they have not received them until today, a year later. In addition, the Xi'an Municipal Government refused to issue them on the grounds that they left Xi'an to work within a year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 30, in Nanchang, Jiangxi, the owners of Zhonghai Zuo'an International Community shouted "Zhonghai, refund your money" at the entrance of the property. It is understood that the owners are defending their rights because the community has no separation of people and vehicles, the public area is too small, there is no space for activities in the community, and one community is divided into north and south areas. With the same housing prices and property fees, the south area is made into a high-end community, while the north area is almost resettlement housing standards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 9, Nantong, Jiangsu. Hongtai Precision Machinery Technology Co., Ltd. went bankrupt, and workers demanded their wages.
December 7, workers from a project of China Construction Third Engineering Bureau in a city in Guangdong blocked the door to demand their wages.
December 9, Chengdu, Sichuan. Workers from real estate developer Zhengyuan Co., Ltd. slept on the floor in its hotel to demand their wages, and the police came to deal with it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 3, Xianyang, Shaanxi. Owners of Ronggang Future City protested against the developer for deceiving consumers, cutting corners, and not laying floor heating in small bedrooms.
December 9, Weihai, Shandong. Owners of Fenghuang Lake Community in Shidao, Rongcheng City gathered at the Party and Mass Service Center of Chishan Street to defend their rights and protest against the increase in property fees.
December 9, Xuchang, Henan. Owners of Boqun Xinzhu Community in Yuzhou accused the developer of lowering standards and reducing specifications. Faced with the owners' rights protection, the developer had a bad attitude and sent people to secretly tear down the banners and clashed with the owners who were guarding the banners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 10, Nanjing, Jiangsu. Investors protested against Article 88 of the new Company Law in front of the High People's Court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 6 (released), Zhanjiang, Guangdong. Workers in Huafa New Town threatened to jump off a building to protest against nine months of wage arrears.
December 6 (released), Jinzhong, Shanxi. Workers of Three Gorges Energy Xiyang Photovoltaic Project occupied the company to demand their wages.
December 3, Jinan, Shandong. Villagers blocked the road to protest against China Energy Construction's highway construction disturbing residents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12, Beijing. Jiyue Automobile owed employees social security, and CEO Xia Yiping was surrounded by angry employees, who demanded that he pay social security and provident fund for employees.
Previously, there were rumors that Jiyue would lay off employees and disband, but Jiyue officials denied it and said it was false news.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 7, Luo Dayou performed in Shenzhen. During the performance, a woman in the audience stood up and shouted, "Taiwan belongs to China! Fight for the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation!" Someone nearby tried to dissuade her, "This is a concert hall. Don't be like this. What are you doing?" 
Afterwards, the woman was forcibly taken away from the scene by the staff, and the fans at the scene applauded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In August, a group of people went undercover to report the dark side of correctional schools. Like Yang Yongxin, the victims included children and independent adults. These people were sent in for various reasons, including because they had independent thoughts and did not listen to their parents, or like the planner of this undercover, they just wanted to take the college entrance examination again, or their parents wanted to "correct" the ideas of sexual minorities. These schools "correct" through violent abuse and prison-like management. These victims experienced physical and mental torture that was more painful than prison. They were illegally detained for several months, during which they were constantly beaten, scolded and abused, and mentally tortured. They were violently forced to write "insincere" letters of gratitude: praising the torture they suffered. The victims suffered serious psychological trauma and a nightmare that will never go away. Even if you are an adult with full behavioral capacity, your parents can send you in as an object at will, unless you completely become...
fullContent:
8月，一群人卧底报道了矫正学校的黑幕，正如杨永信，受害者有孩子，也有独立的成年人。这些人被以各种理由送进去改造，包括因为有自己独立的思想而不听父母话、或是如这次卧底的策划者，仅仅是自己想重新参加高考、又或者是父母想“矫正”性少数的想法。这些学校通过暴力虐待和监狱化管理来“矫正”
这些受害者们经历了比监狱还要痛苦的肉体和精神上的双重折磨，被非法拘禁数月，期间是不停的打骂和虐待，并从心灵上摧残受害者，并暴力逼迫写下“违心的”感恩信：歌颂自己受到的折磨。对受害者们造成了严重的心理创伤和一辈子挥之不去的梦魇。而即使你是一个有完全行为能力的成年人，你父母也可以把你当一个物品一样随意送进去，除非你彻底变成一个听话并让父母满意的“机器人”，否则除了死以外，永远无法离开。
目前相关视频和新闻已经在全网各个平台下架
策划者被关的是“创德青少年智慧成长中心” ，其在开封市龙亭区、山东曹县郑庄、河南商丘永城十八里镇均有校区； 其中，这家机构还将永城校区起名为“专门教育学校”。 文章中还涉及： 成都新巴蜀特训学校； 湖南圣博教育基地； 河南南阳指南针教育基地 河南中牟柯贞教育 这些学校均为矫正/特训学校，涉嫌包括非法拘禁，虐待未成年人和成年人，侮辱殴打等大量违法行为。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, a plane crashed at the Olympic Sports Center in Shashi District, Jingzhou City, catching fire. It was suspected to be an emergency rescue plane. The local emergency management bureau refuted the rumor: it was a drone, and the surrounding area has returned to normal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution Recently, Zhengzhou Zhongyuan District Development Investment Co., Ltd. owed money and refused to pay it back. Victims gathered at the door to defend their rights. Baidu Encyclopedia shows that the company is a state-owned enterprise.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 11, Inner Mongolia. A netizen shared the local village rules, which mentioned: Think more about the good of the Communist Party, and think about how there would be no good situation today without the Communist Party; do not petition with "gray people (dialect)"; when someone says that the Communist Party's policies are not good, stand up and say something fair.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution Recently, Xinjiang government employees at all levels have begun to lay off employees

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Jiyue Auto suddenly had a large-scale layoff. A Jiyue salesperson learned during a live broadcast that he was going to lose his job and acted helpless. There was also a live broadcaster who bought a Jiyue Auto with a loan before being laid off and had no choice but to look for a job in the live broadcast room.
It is reported that Jiyue chose to keep very few employees to maintain the business. The remaining employees have two choices: one is to resign and wait until the end of February next year to get N+1 compensation; the other is to choose to stay, but starting from December, the salary cannot be paid, and the employees have to work at their own expense.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, Jiyue Automobile closed down and its CEO was besieged by employees to demand salary. Social security has not been paid normally since November.
On December 2, Jiyue Automobile refuted the rumor: everything is normal in operation, and asked everyone not to believe in rumors or spread them, otherwise legal responsibility will be pursued.
It is reported that Jiyue Automobile is a new force car company under Geely, with sales exceeding 14,000 units in the first 11 months of this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the Chinese police report, the woman who was "taken in" had undergraduate and master's theses. She should have had a bright future, but...
Netizens expressed regret and sympathy in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Niu Wengui, a migrant worker from Guanyun County, Lianyungang, went online for help. His salary, which had been owed for more than five years, has not yet been paid. Niu Wengui has traveled to Huaibei, Anhui four times to ask for his salary, spending thousands of travel expenses, but still has not received the compensation he deserves.
Finally, the local municipal administration office said that multiple departments would intervene to help him get his salary back. Niu Wengui then asked his wife to borrow the travel expenses to go to Huaibei to get the money, but his wife still didn't believe it because someone promised to get the money last time, but he didn't get the salary back.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 11, the National Immigration Administration published an article entitled "Critical Choices in a Critical Period": The Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as its core is steering the Chinese economic ship forward through the waves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, Ma Huateng published an article on People's Daily Online, saying: Under the leadership of the Party and the government, the private economy will be united and work hard, and there will be a bright future. The Chinese economy will surely move forward against all odds.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
CBS News quoted sources as saying that US President-elect Trump has invited Xi Jinping to attend his inauguration next month, but it is not clear whether Xi Jinping has accepted the invitation.
It is reported that the US presidential inauguration ceremony usually invites diplomats such as ambassadors. The report pointed out that the US State Department's records since 1874 show that no foreign head of state has ever attended the inauguration ceremony.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 10 report: Russia conducted a one-day test to cut off global network access in some areas. During this period, local residents could not access foreign websites and applications such as Google, YouTube, Telegram, WhatsApp, and most VPNs could not work properly. At the same time, they continued to develop their own "sovereign Internet"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 11, the 2024 BWF World Tour Finals was held in Hangzhou. An audience member shouted to the Taiwanese badminton team Li Yang/Wang Qilin: "Taiwan belongs to China! Do you know that?"
There was a cheer at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, it was reported that the individual pension system will be fully rolled out. The regulator pointed out that participating in individual pension investment can meet the diverse pension security needs of the people, which aroused doubts and ridicule from netizens.
Netizens responded with "Ponzi scheme" "Not a penny more will be paid to the state" "I can't even afford the basic pension, and I still have to pay the individual pension"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 6, Japan's Yakult announced the closure of its lactic acid bacteria beverage production base in Shanghai, the Shanghai factory. Yakult responded: Improve production efficiency through restructuring.
Netizens replied, "Someone is going to lose their jobs again." "Foreign capital has withdrawn, and the employment situation will only become more difficult year by year."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Linyi, Shandong. The teacher asked the kindergarten children: What do you want to do when you grow up?
The children answered "I want to be a rich man and find a beautiful woman" "I want to find a rich husband"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/LKR37OE8mj

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhejiang Xingtang Culture issued a statement saying that Jiyue Automobile currently owes the company 37 million yuan in advance payments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Media reports: 3 people pretended to be nuns and chanted scriptures near Nanhua Temple, carrying out illegal religious activities.
Afterwards, the person concerned responded: During this alms-gathering, he did not receive a penny. If he broke the precepts by receiving money, he was willing to commit suicide to apologize. "Communist officials say we are fake monks, but do you dare to say that you, the so-called real monks, have not cheated?" "You still rule China and are still fooling the people. You, the presidents, should die without a burial place!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, anti-collision guardrails were installed at the entrance of a hospital in Taishan, Guangdong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, @FH_China's [Yiyan.com] released data showing that more than 7,800 domestic protests have been collected since June 2022, most of which are related to economic demands such as unfinished buildings and workers demanding wages.
As China's economy tends to weaken this year, economic protests have increased significantly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12 (Release) A blogger discovered that during the 17th Municipal Party Committee Standing Committee Meeting in Chenzhou in 2024, a photo of Mao Zedong was hung on the wall.
Netizens responded, "Just hang them all together" "It's over, time has gone back"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/wQlYY4ZJvJ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, the Syrian Embassy in China raised a new national flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: The person concerned received a call from the Cyberspace Administration of China, where the staff said that the incident involved religion and had spread on the Internet, and suggested deleting the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, Jiangxi Shangrao. Mao Qi, the former secretary of Wannian County, was prosecuted. He was accused of abusing his power and illegally accepting property from others in a huge amount.
Netizens said in the comment area: The amount is huge, how much is it?
It is reported that in July this year, Mao Qi presided over the "Concentrated Rectification of Unhealthy Trends and Corruption Problems Among the People of the County"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Central Economic Conference was held in Beijing from December 11 to 12. The conference proposed: 
Continue to work hard to promote the real estate market to stop falling and stabilize 
Further comprehensively deepen reforms and expand high-level opening up 
Stabilize the property market and stock market, prevent and resolve risks and external shocks in key areas 
Implement more proactive macroeconomic policies to expand domestic demand 
Maintain social harmony and stability, and complete the goals and tasks of the "14th Five-Year Plan" with high quality

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 11, HTS members dug up the tomb of Bashar al-Assad's father and then set fire to the coffin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, it was reported that Zhou Yinpu, a Chinese man holding a Chinese passport and a US green card, was arrested at the San Francisco airport on December 9 when he was about to fly to China. The reason was that he was suspected of using a drone to fly over the US Vandenberg Space Base and take photos at the end of November.
The FBI not only found a special drone from his jacket, but also found chat records on his phone in October discussing the details of the shooting with others on WeChat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The U.S. plans to restrict China's purchase of advanced artificial intelligence chips from third-party countries.
The U.S. government plans to introduce new rules by the end of this month aimed at curbing Chinese companies' purchase of advanced AI chips from unrestricted third-party countries, according to sources. As the measure has not yet been finalized, the implementation date is still subject to change.
However, if confirmed, it would be a rapid escalation of the previous round of chip-related sanctions earlier this month. According to one of the sources, the drafting of the rules referred to the opinions of U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo and National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan, both of whom are considered hawks on China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An 11-year-old girl was accused of cheating in an exam and then jumped to her death. Her parents tried to defend their rights but to no avail, so her father prepared to divorce her and said, "I don't want to implicate innocent people. I want to do what a man should do. If something happens, I hope everyone will help take care of my family." 
11-year-old Fu Chenxin is studying at Shanghai Kangcheng School. On March 14 this year, in an English test, the teacher determined that Fu Chenxin had cheated without sufficient evidence. The head teacher took Fu Chenxin to the office and reprimanded her many times without investigation and verification. 
The next day, Fu Chenxin jumped to her death, and her parents embarked on a long road of defending their rights. 
On December 11, her father said: He is ready to divorce his wife and do what a man should do. If something happens, I hope everyone will help take care of his family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12, Chengdu, Sichuan. A water tower collapsed unexpectedly during the demolition process in a residential area, and some people were crushed.
Official report: 1 person died.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Hong Kong government is planning to legislate to force all taxis to install in-car monitoring and GPS, and to provide at least two electronic payment methods.
In response, an older driver said: I am too old to operate electronic payment, and if it is to be enforced, I can only retire.
Mainland netizens responded "Fully monitoring Hong Kong people is a good method" "Su-style products must be high-quality"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A CNN reporter witnessed the release of a man from a secret prison in Damascus.
After three months in a windowless prison, the man finally saw the sky.
The man had been alone for days without food, water or light, and he didn't know that Bashar al-Assad's regime had collapsed.
The soldier next to him told him that there was no army, no prison, no checkpoint, and Syria was free.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 12 (Released) Zhuhai Yang Baoan Memorial School, the anti-collision stone pier at the entrance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lu Shaye: France or the West are used to looking down on others.
Lu Shaye, the Chinese ambassador to France who is about to leave office and return to China, said that China's foreign policy is to be independent and respect the independence of others. But France or the West is different, which is related to the fact that they have always been at the top of the pyramid and are used to looking down on others.
